title: Interactive 3D Learning Tool Utilization Strategies for Engineering Education

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: An environment where students self-directively visualize and manipulate complex engineering concepts using 3D tools according to their learning progress

learning_goals: Learners can explain the operating principles of engineering systems with over 80% accuracy using interactive animations.
Learners can analyze design problems and independently collect experimental data at least three times using 3D learning tools.
Learners can propose engineering problem-solving solutions based on VR-based simulation results in formative assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
